flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Hi, I have designed this Binglie Bottle Opener. It's inspired from an antique Chinese window pattern called Binglie (means cracking ice) which have been used for more than 600 years. This bottle opener was made with 3D printing. http://www.shapeways.com/model/847486
guide.introduction_rendered: Hi, I have designed this Binglie Bottle Opener. It's inspired from an antique Chinese window pattern called Binglie (means cracking ice) which have been used for more than 600 years. This bottle opener was made with 3D printing. http://www.shapeways.com/model/847486
guide.summary: A classic bottle opener created by 3D printing.
guide.title: Binglie Bottle Opener
